seniority_level.evidence: Data Engineer title without explicit seniority, but complex requirements including data modeling, multiple workflow managers, and data platform responsibilities suggest substantial experience beyond entry level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities involve data pipelines, modeling, and platform work

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on data modeling, data marts, key indicator tables, and data quality management. Focus on CDC, user behavior events, and search data processing

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team leadership, or mentoring responsibilities. Pure individual contributor role focused on technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on CDC, scheduled data processing, data marts creation, and workflow managers suggests batch processing approach. No real-time streaming mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows must-have skills include multiple orchestrators: Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect - modern orchestrator category

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies mentioned in the job posting

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Seoul, South Korea with no mention of remote work options

timezone_focus.evidence: Specific location requirement (Seoul, South Korea) indicates country-specific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Position based in Seoul with no remote options, implying relocation to Seoul area would be necessary for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: Korean company in Seoul with no mention of international visa sponsorship. Korean text suggests local hiring focus

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, position appears to require Korean work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: Korean company likely requires work authorization in South Korea, but no specific citizenship requirement mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with probation period suggests traditional employment (W2 equivalent in Korean context)

benefits_level.evidence: Only benefit mentioned is 3-month probation period with 100% salary. No comprehensive benefits package described

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (SQL, Python, workflow managers) and nice-to-have skills (data quality tools, Databricks), suggesting balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description clearly defining data engineering role with specific responsibilities around data platform, modeling, and quality management

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements appear reasonable for mid-level data engineer role - SQL, Python, workflow managers are standard expectations without excessive inflation
